title: Rivian Stock Price Edges Higher: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: Shares in the electric vehicle maker rose premarket, adding to its $100 billion market capitalization
body:
Stock futures are a touch higher Friday but major indexes are still poised to snap a five-week winning streak, knocked by concerns about high levels of inflation. Here’s what we’re watching in markets:
Write to Caitlin Ostroff at caitlin.ostroff@wsj.com
